sense.gloss: long kimono made from the same plain-coloured cloth
klesha (polluting thoughts such as greed, hatred and delusion, which result in suffering)
finger marks, dirt from the hands
to be refined, to be polished, to be stylish, to be sophisticated
scale (i.e. hard water coating in a kettle, etc.), fur
(with) unkempt hair and dirty face, being indifferent to one's personal appearance
solid wood (as opposed to veneer), natural wood
cloth, sponge, etc. used to remove grime from the skin
shred (of decency, etc.), scrap, bit, smidgen

k_ele.e: つめの垢を煎じて飲む
爪のあかを煎じて飲む

r_ele.r: つめのあかをせんじてのむ

sense.gloss: to take a lesson from (someone serving as an example), to learn from someone's example, to boil the dirt under (someone's) fingernails and drink it
female assistant who scrubbed customers at public baths and also offered sexual services (Edo period)

sdata.j: この↑絵↑↓え↓は↑垢抜↑↓あかぬ↓けしたかき↑方↑↓ほう↓だ。
sdata.e: The picture is done in a masterly style.

sdata.j: ↑歯垢↑↓しこう↓がずいぶん↑付↑↓つ↓いていると↑思↑↓おも↓いますが。
sdata.e: I think I have a lot of plaque build up.

sdata.j: ↑歯垢↑↓しこう↓をとらなければなりません。
sdata.e: The plaque has to be removed.

sdata.j: ↑耳↑↓みみ↓↑垢↑↓あか↓を↑取↑↓と↓って↑欲↑↓ほ↓しい。
sdata.e: I want the wax cleaned from my ears.

sdata.j: ↑可憐↑↓かれん↓な、↑清浄↑↓せいじょう↓↑無垢↑↓むく↓な↑姿↑↓すがた↓をした↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は、↑貴下↑↓きか↓と↑小生↑↓しょうせい↓の↑名↑↓な↓をのろいながら↑自殺↑↓じさつ↓したのです。
sdata.e: She, with such a sweet and pure figure, killed herself while cursing both of our names.

sdata.j: ↑仮令↑↓たとい↓↑遊女↑↓ゆうじょ↓でも↑純粋↑↓じゅんすい↓な↑恋↑↓こい↓をすれば、その↑恋↑↓こい↓は↑無垢↑↓むく↓な↑清↑↓きよ↓いものです。
sdata.e: Even if she's a prostitute which falls in love, her love is a pure and noble feeling.

sdata.j: トムって↑垢抜↑↓あかぬ↓けてるね。
メアリーって、↑垢抜↑↓あかぬ↓けてるよね。
トムって↑垢抜↑↓あかぬ↓けてるって↑思↑↓おも↓う？
sdata.e: Do you think Tom is sophisticated?
